summary: An ex-Navy man carrying out the last wish of a dying shipmate renews contact with old friends to break the code of silence around a mysterious, long-buried crime.
cast: Jamey Sheridan|Steve Buscemi|Mariann Mayberry|Aidan Quinn|John Savage|Campbell Scott|Titus Welliver|Karen Young|Jayne Atkinson|Bill Sage|Emily Donahoe|Asher Grodman|Andrew Dolan|Rutanya Alda|Kevin Reed|Blake Lowell|Tom Degnan|Elizabeth Hess|Danny Lane|Reathel Bean|Nicholas Carriere|Anita Hollander|June Stein|Carmen López|Blake Hammond|Sidney Williams|Brian Patrick Russell|Philip Willcox|Doug Goodenough|Jordan Cooper|Brian Lindvall|John Ferrier|Jon Bates|Salvatore Carella|Skippy D|Erin Deighan|Monique Dupree|Lars Engstrom|John Farrer|Brooke Herron|Moe Hindi|Derrick Jones|Jeffrey Miller|Craig Newman|Peter Conboy|Dan Gregory|Rennel Turner|Blake Zawadzki
title: Handsome Harry
